mapper.select: select avb_amnt tfcc from tb_acc where user_code=#{userCode}
select sum(amnt) jfcc from tb_acc_def d , tb_acc_detail a where d.sub_accno=a.sub_accno and cuy_type='2' and user_type='1' and user_code=#{userCode}
select sum(amnt) mtfcc from tb_acc_detail where bouns_source1='11' and user_code=#{userCode}
select sum(amnt) reward from tb_acc_detail where rela_usercode=#{userCode} and bouns_source1 ='40' and (rela_userlevel = '' or rela_userlevel is NULL)
select sum(amnt) wtfcc from tb_acc_def f,tb_acc_detail d where f.sub_accno=d.sub_accno and acc_type='1' and cuy_type='1' and d.bouns_source1='12' and d.user_code=#{userCode}
select sum(amnt) gmjl from tb_acc_detail where user_code=#{userCode} and bouns_source1 ='15'

select caldate rewardDate,sum(lvajl) aReward,sum(lvbjl) bReward,sum(lvcjl) cReward from (select date_format(caldate,'%Y-%m-%d') caldate,user_code, case when bouns_source2='1101' then amnt else 0 end lvajl , case when bouns_source2='1102' then amnt else 0 end lvbjl , case when bouns_source2='1103' then amnt else 0 end lvcjl from tb_acc_detail ) a where a.user_code=#{userCode} group by caldate;
mapper.insert: insert into tb_acc_outdetail (user_code, sub_acc_no, outamnt, outdate, cntflag, target_system, status, create_time, modify_time, operator) values( #{user_code}, #{sub_acc_no}, #{outamnt}, #{outdate}, #{cntflag}, #{target_system}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{modify_time}, #{operator} )
